name: Awesome-emojify
tagline: A jQuery plugin to convert Emoji keywords to images
body:
### Why
I created this plugin, so that in an easy way without any skills you can use emoticons on your own site

### Installation
Just add it to your page head:

`<script scr="awesome-emojify.min.js></script>`

or (for development)

`<script scr="awesome-emojify.js></script>`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
